publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2525.1 Elizabeth Smith: SNP Government Failure on Jobs for Newly-Qualified Teachersâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2525) in the name of Rhona Brankin, leave out from "show leadership" to end and insert "make a ministerial statement on this subject as soon as practicable following receipt of the report of the Teacher Employment Working Group."
